arts.ttl: West Brom fan dies following medical emergency at Sheffield Wednesday
arts.sum: A West Brom supporter has died following a medical emergency during the team's 3-2 defeat away at Sheffield Wednesday.

arts.ttl: West Brom fan dies while watching Baggies play Sheffield Wednesday at Hillsborough
arts.sum: West Bromwich Albion have confirmed one of their supporters sadly passed away after being taken ill during the Baggies' clash with Sheffield Wednesday at Hillsborough

arts.sum: The Baggies had battled back from 2-0 down to level.

arts.ttl: West Brom declared transfer window winners after £4.2m boost
arts.sum: Sheffield United (-24%) and Burnley (-25%) prop up the other table, having seen their squad values drop drastically following relegation. Albion intelligently went about how they replaced those players in order to give Carlos Corberan a strong hand, a hand in which he has used to guide the club to the top of the Championship in the early stages of the new season; they signed 11 new players, seven of them on permanent deals, while the club have also benefitted from the return from injury of Josh Maja.
